dcterms:description: A collection of pre-modern Hebrew texts, including late 19th and early 20th century texts from Project Ben-Yehuda and rabbinical texts from the medieval period, primarily Mishneh Torah.
dcterms:title: Dotted modern Hebrew text (PRE-MODERN portion)

dcterms:description: A collection of rabbinical texts, most notably the Mishneh Torah, used for training Hebrew diacritization models.
dcterms:title: Mishneh Torah (rabbinical texts)

dcterms:description: A collection of short stories in Hebrew, used for automatic diacritization without manual validation.
dcterms:title: Short story project (AUTOMATIC portion)

dcterms:creator: A. Shmidman
S. Shmidman
M. Koppel
Y. Goldberg
dcterms:description: A benchmark dataset for dotting modern Hebrew documents, consisting of 22 documents from a single source, Hebrew Wikipedia articles.
dcterms:title: Dicta test set

dcterms:creator: A. Shmidman
S. Shmidman
M. Koppel
Y. Goldberg
dcterms:description: A new test set for Modern Hebrew dotting, created from a larger variety of texts than existing datasets, totaling 20,474 Hebrew tokens.
dcterms:title: New test set for Modern Hebrew dotting
